title: LoadAnimation​
content: </> Animate.LoadAnimation( humanoid: Humanoid , animationId: string ) → () Loads the animation referenced by its Asset ID to the provided humanoid.

title: RunOnTouched​
content: </> Trigger.RunOnTouched( trigger: Part , callback: (player: Player ) → () ) → () Calls the provided callback function when the trigger part is touched.
